entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #31134
    8.0.1xx
  • Backport Docker `--platform` switch support to .NET 7.latest #31133
  • Migrating C++/CLI project throws compiler warning C4945 #31123
  • During installation of SDK 8.0 P2, some components still have the P1 branding. #31121
  • Solution filter fails to build for valid paths on Linux #31119
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64]On VS 17.6 preview 3 which carries NET 8 preview 2 sdk, installing maui template failed with error "Workload ID maui is not recognized." #31116
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64]On VS 17.6 preview 3 which carries net 8 preview 2 SDK, running web project failed in CLI. #31114

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31135
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31118
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31108
    Area-Infrastructure
  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator by default for PublishAot #31109
  • 30784 dotnet info workload info #31007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add explicit deployment tools dependency #31129
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] fix columns when param is specified #31087
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31113
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30972
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Add new line to C# project templates with file-scoped namespaces #30973
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Document for breaking changes, Area-NetSDK
  • Interactive mode proof of concept #30832
  • Split static web assets SDK from the Razor SDK #31079
    Area-AspNetCore
